English: I dreamed a dream.
A dream where the whole world was slowly being consumed by darkness. A dream I never wish to dream again.
All I could do was watch the world fall into darkness.
I dreamed a dream.
About he who shone his way to my side as sunshine when I was sobbing like a little child.
When he reached out his hand,
flowers bloomed into a thousand colors,
the earth and sky regained their lushness,
and the sun chased the darkness away.
When I woke up from the dream,
I could not remember the face,
nor the voice-
but I still remember the warmth of the pat on my back.
Which is why I must meet this person.
My guide.
My stars.
My destiny.
Err... It’s already been a month since I parted with Stardust.
I wonder if the leader has crossed the continent by now?
This trip... It’s gonna be great! I even dreamed of him!
Right, guys?
Ahaha! Guys, that tickles!
Dear Magical Tarot Carriage, please hurry us to the World Tree!
Have you ever heard the whispers of a star?
The clear yet mysterious sounds
For today is the day—
Every astrologer will gather here to observe the skies above this very place.
The holy land where astrology emerged, the World Tree.
Wow... So crowded. Well, today is a very special day after all.
I, Ophelia the witch,
have come to offer my prayer to the World Tree as a diviner of the stars.
Please guide my path so that I can see the light in the eyes of the people,
and... If you could please make my beloved the most handsome of...
Shush! You’re always like that whenever we’re here. You need to behave yourself. This is a holy place.
Huh...? Vellekia!! Where are you going?!
It’s dangerous to wander off like that here!
Vellekia? Are you there?
...What’s that light...?
Huh? A magic circle?
Whoa!
I knew that you would come.
You who became my last dream...
Who are-
Ugh... My head! What in the world just happened?
What is this place?
Is everyone okay?
Huh...?
Guys...? Why are you all so quiet?
Is this some kind of a joke?
Oh come on!
This isn't funny at all. Answer me!
Elliciad! Vellekia! Carta! Panelity? Gigantes?
Um...
I’m sorry...
It’s my fault that my friends are gone.
I should’ve kept an eye on them the entire time... It’s all my fault...
Um... Well... If you’re okay with me... Can I offer you my help...?
It’s alright...
Actually, can you tell me how to get out of here?
I need to find a way to get my friends back.
Um... the inside of the World Tree is incredibly complex and can be quite dangerous..
Uh... I think it’s best... if you go with me...
So you were gathering tree sap from here?
Yes, the young leaves here have a special energy that invigorates the mind...
And, uh, I need some inspiration... You see, um... I’m a writer...
Oh wow, a writer! That’s wonderful!
Hehe, I write romance novels. I’m a bit embarrassed about it though...
Oh, I love romance novels too.
Especially ‘Young Puppy Love No. 1’ by Wild Glasses!!
I mean the ending, it’s... Is it even possible for someone to come up with such a brilliant ending?
Ahaha... I guess you could say I’m... familiar with that author...
Um, so you mentioned that you’re an astrologer?
Oh, yes! I read Tarot cards for people whom I encounter during the pilgrimage.
My friends would get so excited every time a person came for a reading...
Please do cheer up... Surely there must be a way.
Uh... If it’s not too much to ask, can you tell me more about yourself on the way...?
Oh wow... So you’re pursuing your destiny then...
Well, my destined one, to be exact.
Huh..? You meant that kind of destiny?
I thought you were talking about something grand, like concerning the fate of this world or something like that...
Heh, don’t you know that a girl’s love is more important than the fate of the world?
(On the road to find love...)
(Perfect material for volume 2.)
Ahaha... I see.
But none of this matters if my friends aren’t with me.
Hmm... From the looks of it, your friends...
they sound like elementals...
Elementals... It’s a bit more complicated than that.
Only I can sense them.
Oh, come to think of it, you don’t look surprised at all. Even after all these... strange stuff.
Most people think I’m joking or making things up.
Erm... well, I’m kind of similar to you.
I’m a gnome.
Gnome...! So that’s why you have those ears...
Hehe, *blushes* yes, yes.
Um, I don’t think I’ve ever heard of friends like yours.
Not even the books from the library had anything like this...
Library?
Oh, did I not mention it earlier?
Being a writer is more of a side job. I’m the scribe for the Royal Great Library of Orvel.
*Gasp* The scribe of the Royal Great Library of Orvel?
The Royal Great Library that is said to contain every existing book ever?
Hehe, thanks to Princess Scarlet, that is. She’s quite the bookworm.
I heard the Royal Great Library of Orvel is basically the fountain of knowledge.
I might be able to find a lead on how to get my friends back...
Um, Leo, is it possible for me to tag along and visit the library with you?
There might be some information on how to bring my friends back.
Excuse me? Err.. Um... We can’t just barge into the Royal Great Library...
Ahaha... Maybe we can ask for permission then..
(Yes!)
Wow... Everything is all so grand here...
I'm so excited...!
I’ve been to the capital when I was on a tour with Stardust, but I've never actually visited the Royal Great Library!
They say that this building was the very first to be built when they started constructing the castle.
Thanks to the forefathers who loved to read, now this place is vast beyond measure...
All sorts of rare books from all over the world are gathered here.
Even during the Demon War, I was here, guarding these books.
(The Demon War? Just how old is he?)
Oh wow... A library this big may even
have the books of my favorite author, Wild Glasses!
Ahaha... perhaps...
Leo.
Ah, Princess Scarlet. What a pleasant surprise to see you here. I, Scribe Leo, stand before Her Highness.
Oh! Witch Ophelia, also stands before Her Highness!
Witch?
(Oops, I probably shouldn't have said that in the castle.)
Um... She’s harmless, Your Highness.
I met her outside during my stroll,
and she begged me to let her in to find a book... I just couldn’t refuse her request.
With your permission, perhaps I could allow her to see just the common literature, Your Highness....
I don’t think I’ve ever heard you speak so strongly.
I trust anyone that you trust.
I hope you find the book that you’re looking for.
Thank you very much, Your Highness!
...I have something to discuss with you regarding father’s illness.
I believe you may have an answer for it.
I wonder if there's even a small possibility for him to get better...
There aren’t any books on getting my friends back, let alone a book about my friends...
So you haven’t found your book...
Hmm... Or perhaps it’s in the restricted area...
The restricted area?
Exceptionally rare books are separately managed in a restricted area...
It’d be a tremendous loss to our country if any of those books are lost...
And those books aren’t like other books... they tend to...
Oh dear, forgive me and my babbling. Please forget what I just said!
No, no, thank you so much for telling me this!
I’ll look in there!
I’m terribly sorry, but I really can’t let you in there...
U-uh, farewell and take care...
I... I can’t give up now.
I grew up with them, spending every moment with them. They’re my family.
I... I can’t just give up on them.
Please. I beg you.
If there’s even a glimmer of hope, I’m willing to do anything.
Entering the restricted area without permission is an extremely serious felony.
Your Highness!
However.
Your words have moved me. I’ll make an exception.
...I can’t give you much time though.
Creeeeepy... this feels nothing like the place before!
No. No, no. I’m not afraid at all!
Just keep tight, guys. I'm coming to save you all.
Um... Please be careful...
Most of the books in the restricted area are affected by magical spells...
And they have nasty tempers... They may attack you when they’re angry...
That's why it’s usually just me, the scribe, that comes and goes...
Books that attack people?!
Um, I’ll be careful!
Hmm... Where should I start...
Huh...?
[Alert! Alert!]
[Intruder alert! Intruder alert!]
[Everyone wake up!! Everyone wake up!!]
Shh! Sh-Shush!
[Shush?]
Yes! Shush!
[Input: shush...]
[*SCREECH*]
*Books falling out everywhere*
Waaaah....
...We're doomed!!!
*Sigh* We need to knock them out so they don’t hurt themselves!
Please be careful! We cannot damage the books!
[Emergency alert! Emergency alert!]
This book... Ugh, so loud!
That’s odd... I don’t remember seeing a book like that...
[Intruder detected! Intruder detected!]
Hey you! Seriously! Be quiet!
[Input: Hey you! Seriously! Be quiet!]
[*SCREECH*]
Aaaah! So loud!
[Input: Aaaah! So loud!]
[*SCREECH* Emergency Alert! Emergency Alert!]
Why are you doing this to me!
Ophelia!
These books of the restricted area... have bewitched locks...
This was done to prevent others without the set voice code of the original owner from reading the book.
That book... it will quiet down if we can enter the correct code!
Voice code?
I don’t know if it’s broken or something, but it seems to react only to you, Ophelia.
What? Um, then let's try...
O-open?!
[Input: O-open...]
[*SCREECH*]
No password?
[Input: No password...]
[*SCREECH*]
G-giant hornet?
[*SCREECH*]
Huh? Giant hornet? Out of nowhere?
Hehe, I just said whatever that came up in my head...
Ah! Or maybe! *SCREECH*?!
[*SCREECH*]
Ugh, why are you being so difficult!
[Input: Ugh why are you being so difficult]
No, I didn’t mean t-
[*SCREECH* Too many failed attempts! Security Mode activated! Security Mode activated!]
[Casting an attack spell in 30 seconds... 30, 15, ...]
Waaah!
O-Ophelia! Watch out!
Huh? The book just flinched!
[A-attack spell in... 5, 4, 3, 2]
Could it be?
Ophelia?
[Input: Ophelia...]
[Alarm deactivated! Alarm deactivated! Unlocked!]
This doesn’t make sense! My name is the code?
The books from our ancestors can be... quite difficult to fathom.
I don’t really understand it either...
But I think this is the book you’ve been looking for.
[The Origin and Nature of All Existing Beings - Final Volume]
[Plants, Animals, Spirits, Elementals...]
Oh my...
The ancient runes of the book... are shifting into readable letters...
This book... I think the author cast a special spell on this book...
As if this book is only available for you...
A book for me...
I must read it now.
Ophelia, did you find anything on your friends?
Umm, this is odd. I don’t think I can find it from the Elementals volume.
Hmm?
Ah! Wait!
((Others -
Most of these beings I mentioned earlier may be found through magical means.
However, according to The One, there are also funny creatures that are impossible to define.
If one had to pinpoint a category, they would be sorted as Elementals.
But these beings born under the stars of destiny are 'metaphysical properties.'
Familiar concepts nowadays would be 'Love, Death, and Fortune.’))
Ah!
((It is written that all emotions depend on Love, Death, and Fortune.
Which means that one possessing these properties can see the future.
For all beings on this earth are affected by them.
However, they can only be seen by the chosen one from their world.
We can only feel them and be aware of their existence.))
Ophelia, what exactly do you see?
Look, these little ones are circling around me.
I can’t understand a single word you’re saying.
B-but that’s so weird... I’m not lying...
They even whisper their names to me.
This is it.
It’s talking about my friends...
Such... mystical and interesting information...
But Ophelia, I’m afraid this won’t help you much.
Hmm... There isn’t any info on this 'The One.' It seems like this person is the author...
Actually, it is pretty helpful.
I know who I need to see now.
Eh?
If I can’t find the writer...
then the editor who wrote down these words must know almost as much about my friends!
(Editor - Witch Eucaletus)
B-but, this book was written really, really, really long time ago...
Um... I’m quite sure that this person has already passed away.
Hmm... I guess I can try to summon her spirit while gazing at the stars of the departed.
Erm... It’s just that I haven’t heard about a witch named Eucaletus.
Oh? There’s more writing underneath her name!
(Awaiting the light at the altar of Galluah...)
The altar of Galluah can only mean that place...
But rumor has it that place is...
Perhaps this is a trap?
No, even if it is, I must do anything to find a clue!
Let’s go to the altar!
I can ask them the location of the grave.
Eeek... It’s so creepy here.
*BANG*
Huh?
*BANG BANG! BANG! BANG!*
UGH! Filthy trash!
Aaaaah! Who’s there!?
AAAAAAAHH!!! Dammit, who the hell are you?
Ah, it can be easy to get lost around here in Galluah because of the fog.
(All the way out here to meet a dead person? She must be insane.)
Yo. I wouldn’t go there if I were you. Unless you have a death wish or something.
My bullets just go straight past these suckers.
Ugh, where in the world did the old man go?
Erm... What an odd person.
I guess he’s a bit crazy.
Ugh... It’s so cold here...
*Rustle*
Who dares awaken us?
Eeek!
I... I have something to ask you.
Since you all have watched over Galluah for the longest time, I-
Are you mocking us, the ones that are not allowed to rest?
No, no! It’s the opposite! I need your help!
Please! Please tell me where the grave of Eucaletus is!
Yess... It’s true that we know best what happens in the plains of Galluah...
Including that wretch who was burned at the stake over there, near the end of that altar.
Ahaha... So that’s where it is. Thank you so much. U-Uh, I’ll be leaving n-
Did you really think you could leave here alive?
P-pardon?
This realm is hell itself... you can only feel the eternal pain...
If you wish to enter the altar,\nthen share with us your flesh.
We want rest... Grant us rest!
N-no..!
Never!
At this rate, I-
Ah!
This place! The altar of the undead...!
What they truly need is...
rest...
Carta!
Your ardent plea has awakened me, the caller of death.
I am Carta, one who grants eternal rest.
I answer thy call, master.
Ah... serenity at last...
We give you our thanks...
Carta... Thank you so much for coming back... Thank you so much!
This is it.... I think this is the place.
If I meet this Eucaletus person,
I should be able to find a way to find the others!
O’ Asiphia, star of the dead,
I wish to briefly speak with a spirit on your star through Carta.
Huh? Nothing's happening!
Master, Asiphia’s voice cannot reach the one you seek.
The person you seek is not dead.
Eh...? Not dead?
...It appears that she’s neither dead nor alive.
I shall open the path that leads to her.
Ahh!
That’s a lot of dust... *Cough cough* What is this place?
*Cough cough*... Huh?
Wait, this is... a card.
So, another fool who seeks eternal life enters this realm... Ha ha ha.
Ahh! You surprised me!
Hello! Um... I’m here to see someone called Eucaletus...
Ha, someone that knows my name... Interesting.
Ah! So you’re...?!
Yes... It is I, Eucaletus.\nthe forgotten witch.
How does it feel to see someone who abandoned her physical body? Contemptible, aren't I?
N-not really, no.
Ha.. So, clearly you’re no ordinary being if you’ve made it this far...
What is it that you want from me?
Uh... I have some questions on the book you worked on...
I need your help to get my friends back!
A book...
Please, tell me more about the one you wrote about the ones born under the stars of destiny.
You... How did you get a hold of that book?
Why do you ask?!
You... You!
Y-yes?
Name... Give me your name... YOUR NAME!
Um, I am Ophelia, the witch.
F-finally... Finally!
Master, have you finally decided to forgive me?
Huh? What are you talking about all of a sudden?
I have awaited far too long.
I, Witch Eucaletus, greets the savior that will again engrave my very existence.
By meeting you, I will finally be forgiven.
Thank you so much for letting me have my name recorded in history.
(What is going on…? Her tone completely changed all of a sudden...)
Uh... I’m sorry, but I don’t really understand what’s happening here... Mind elaborating?
In the past, I was punished for trying to harm a precious star of my master.
When she delivered my punishment, she said that
until my master's successor, a girl named ‘Ophelia' comes to me,
I will suffer this cycle of the torment of being neither dead nor alive.
Unbelievable... Why would...
So, even though I accomplished many things along with my master,
my feats were not recorded in the history of witches.
I was once called the Great Witch of Wisdom but that glory is now all gone...
I did my best to lift the curse.
Engraving the name of my master's comrades into the book was one of the efforts...
Hoping that you will one day decipher the book's contents and find me...
Master? Just who exactly are you talking about?
Is that ‘The One’ you wrote about in your book?
I'm sure that the master is waiting for you.
What... w-wait!!
My friends have disappeared! Please tell me how to get them back!
I do not know.
I only wrote down what my master used to say.
Your friends were also master’s closest friends.
My friends were close with that person...?
Did your master say anything else about my friends?!
That’s all I know.
If you wish to know more, why don’t you seek out the successor of Mira's will?
Mira?
My master used to be close with Mira.
She often spoke of her as well as her children.
Ah...! Please don’t go!
I still have questions!
Your trial has already begun.
Believe in yourself, and the path you lead.
For you are the noble successor that will hold the fate of this world in your eyes,
O’ savior.
Ah... What in the world was she talking about...? She disappeared...
If Mira is the Mira from the month of love, from one of the constellations,
I should probably head to Elidora then...
Mira’s birthplace, and the forest that’s called the heaven of songs...
Hmm... The successor of the will of Mira...
Oh! But who exactly is this Master person she kept talking about?...
Hm... Or maybe!
Maybe it’s ‘The One’?
If that’s the case, I can’t wait!
Ah... Huh? You are..
Huh? What the-
Why do you keep following me?
I never followed you.
Tsk, as if I need another chance encounter.
I need to find that old geezer!
There are no coincidences when it comes to meeting someone.
There’s a reason for everything.
Huh. I feel like I heard that from a gambling place before.
It annoys me.
Such a weird person.
Hey, wait.
You said you’re a fortune teller, right?
Excuse me?
Don’t make me repeat myself. Ok, so there’s this guy with
black hair, and a gun that looks like a huge bag!
Right, with a lollipop! He always has a lollipop in his mouth!
That’s what he looks like.
Black hair... a gun that resembles a bag... and a lollipop... Hahaha...
(I have no clue what he’s talking about!)
That’s good enough, right?
So! I need you to find a way to meet the old man. That’s what I’d like.
Ah... Hahaha, you mean you want a Tarot reading on directions, right?
Yeah! That! I want that!
What am I doing...
*Sigh* I will begin the ritual. Please raise your head and look at me.
I, Witch Ophelia, will look into your eyes.
O’ stars that shine this world, please light the path ahead.
Now... please pick 3 cards.
Come on.. do I really have to do something like this?
Ahaha... The first card you’ve picked is [The Fool] card, upright.
If you look at the bottom of the The Fool, there’s a white dog-
Hey, let me pick another card.
Wha- You can’t just touch them-
Shaddup! Start over!
[The Fool]
Again!
[The Fool]
Again! Again! AGAIN!
ARGH!
Why am I getting the same card over and over again?!
Why am I so unlucky these days!?
Getting fake chips from a nutjob at the gambling area..\nAnd picking the worst cards...
It’s not my fault that you’re unlucky...
I better just find the old man myself.
Bye.
Hello...? You need to pay...!
Ugh! I’m literally broke these days!
Hey, this chip is all I have!
Here, a fake chip for a phony reading! HAHA!
Such a weird person...
It’s been a while since I’ve had a rude customer like that...
I'm gonna tell Esker about this guy when I meet him!
*Beehive falls off*
Ah?!
*Bzzzz*
*Bzzzzzzzzzzzzzz*
Ee....Eeee.....
*BZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ*
Wahhhhhhhhhhh!
*BZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ!!!!*
Just what is going on today!!!
WAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!! Go away!
Please! Somebody! Help!
La la la la! La la!
Huh, who’s that?
Hello, pretty young lady!
Maybe she didn’t hear me?
Hellooooooo?
Oh wow!
Were you dancing with the bees?
Lemme join you!
*Pant*... *Pant*... Thank you... So... Much...
What a lovely dance party!
*Talks*
*Listens*
... and that’s how I ended up here.
So kind-hearted! You came all the way here to find your friend...
*Humming*
Huh? Mr. Schute, Ophelia looks familiar to you?
Maybe you are imagining things. This is our very first meeting with Ophelia.
Huh? Our? Is there someone else here with you?
Oh! This is Mr. Schwanheite!
Ah...haha... I... I see.
Um...  Do you live here in Elidora, Shea?
Umm, not exactly,
but I’m promoting the ‘Ball of Shadows’ which will open tonight.
Oh wow... A midnight ball in the woods...
That sounds fascinating!
*Whispers*
Wow! Mr. Schute, that’s a brilliant idea!
Ophelia, won’t you be our special guest at the ball tonight?
Eh...? Me?
Yes! You see, Mr. Schute and I were wondering which song we should perform at the ball tonight.
A Song?
Yup! A song!
The guests tonight have lost something dear to them.
So we’re looking for a song that will restore color to the shadows.
And I thought we can decide the song by your Tarot card reading!
But I need to find my frien-
I know we’ll be able to find a happy melody with your help!
Your friends are bound to come find you if they hear this song!
There are too many songs in this world. I can’t pick!
Personally, I hope it’s a song like the [Green Nature’s Melody].
No, no- Or maybe a song like the [Rising Dawn]!
I ended up inside the carriage without even noticing...
Erm... But it’s not like it feels wrong. It’s weird, but I can’t explain it.
Actually... I even feel comfortable.
I guess that’s thanks to her charm.
And a ball in this lovely forest...
That’s so romantic!
Oh, Ophelia!
How can I pay for the reading?
Your beautiful singing will do.
Oh wow! I’ll do my best!
I’ll begin the ritual now.
I, Witch Ophelia, will look into your eyes.
O’ stars that shine this world, please light the path ahead.
Shea, please pick a card!
Umm, Mr. Shute, you pick one too!
The first card is card no. 24, The Wand, reversed.
This card features a boy collecting the stars above the sky into one place,
but inverted. It shows that there’s insatiable loneliness within you.
Hmm...
The second card is The Old Tree, upright.
If you look closely, there’s a man leaning against a tree, crying.
It suggests that you are looking for support to soothe your loneliness.
And last but not least. The last card is The Shining Garden of the Night, upright.
Now that’s a good card.
It features light shining upon flowers that are dying due to lack of sunlight.
It means that you will console the lonely somehow.
So in conclusion,
a song that comforts and heals...?
Consolation...
Mr. Schute, you were thinking that song too?
Then I guess it’s finally time for that song!
Hello everyone, how did you enjoy tonight’s show?
As the finale, I will be performing a special song, a song that’s never been performed before!
This is a special song selected through Ophelia’s cards.
This song was made a very long time ago. The lyrics were written by a poet.
A poet?
Yep! Mr. Schute is one of the closest friends to Mira, the poet who sings of love.
Right, Mr. Schute?
*humming*
Mira!
Mira sometimes visits those concerts in my dreams as well.
She compliments me saying that of the children born in the month of love, I resemble her the most.
The successor of Mira's will...
Could it be...?
Now, ladies and gentle-shadows,
I hope this song brings warmth to your hearts!
The girl wakes up from a long dream, and holds the small one in her hand close to her heart.
Its heart was cold as ice,
so she held the heart so tight, stopping it from turning to ice.
Just a spoonful of warmth to loneliness, that will do-
Ah~ The light shines into a heart dark as the shadow, oh-
This familiar longing...
I feel like tearing up...
Ah... Ah...
This is... the story of that time when I first met her!
Did everyone enjoy the song?
Ah...
Mira always used to tell Mr. Schute that
that her dear friend asked her to play this song,
saying when the time is right one day, he should play this song.
I’m so happy that I finally get to play this song!
Ah... Ah...
To constantly heal and comfort the numerous scars of this world,
the title of this song is,
Elliciad...
*humming*
*humming*
Huh? This song has not been released yet...
Waaaah, Ophelia I missed you so much!
I’ve been waiting for you for so long! Never leave me again!
Huh? Look at all these friends who lost love!
Just give me a moment! I will return your light!
Wow! The colors of the shadows have returned!
Oh, Mr. Schute, did you say that someone is here?
Hellooo!
I’m sorry... and thank you... Elliciad.
Huh?
What... What is this feeling...
Ah!
Huh? Ophelia?
Where did she go?
Mr. Schute! Don’t just keep the information to yourself! Share it with me as well!
Ah... My head hurts...
This place is...
I see that you’ve met Eucaletus and Schwanheite.
W-who are you...?
I’ve been waiting for you.
You! That voice..! From the World Tree..!
It’s you!
The master of Eucaletus, a friend of Mira... They’re all you!
Yes. And it is also I who put your friends to sleep. Fufu...
W-why do you look like me?
Because if you look at my actual appearance, you might pass out from the shock? Fufu...
I have much to talk about with you.
Let's go for a walk.
I’ve been looking forward to meeting you for a very long time.
I waited, and waited...
I even manifested my will to
That magic circle back then... So it was...
Yes...
But it was impossible for me to maintain that conjuration until your birth.
I only had one chance.
I used the energy of insight formed by the gathering starlight to form that magic circle.
The World Tree... Stars of the Prophecy... Insight...
Everything makes sense now...
You are... the very root of astrology...
You are...
Lasiphil the Prophet.
Why? Why do you want to meet me that much...?
I just don’t understand... Why would you...
I’m just an ordinary witch.
No, you’re special, little one.
Before I took the form of the stars and disappeared, I saw you in my dreams.

do you think is the first chosen of the stars of destiny?

Please.

Vellekia! Thank you so much for coming back!

Ophelia, my dear girl who became my last dream...
Yes, for it is I, Lasiphil.

Ophelia, you are ready to lead the fate of this world.
You were specially chosen by

enchant the holy ground with a conjuration.

may chime louder tonight.

you may meet a stranger that makes your heart flutter.

you will reach what your heart desires the most.
